page.title: 13TOURISM AND CLEETHORPES
page.content: Each year up to one million people visit Cleethorpes. Most come just for the day by coach, train or car. Many people come from {Yorkshire }and{ {Nottinghamshire}but they also come from much farther away such as Liverpool.For people staying, there are {33 guest houses }and{26 hotels.} What attracts the tourists most is the beach but also,free entertainment, leisure and watersports. People from abroad, particularly{Nigeria,}also enquire about {Cleethorpes . To attract people to {Cleethorpes,} they put advertisements in national newspapers and the Tourist Board publications. The{Leisure Centre}is the facility that attracts the most visitors. We found out that most people would like the pier to be reopened, also more seats and litter bins are needed.
